name: ensemble-ai
description: Ensemble AI Research System - Multi-model debate for research questions

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.preflight: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run lint:ubiquitous-language && (cd backend && npx vitest run --reporter=dot) && (cd frontend && npx vitest run --reporter=dot)
scripts.preflight:fast: (cd backend && npx vitest run --reporter=dot) && (cd frontend && npx vitest run --reporter=dot)
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
